original_text: Jacob took branches that he had cut from trees. He took them from poplar trees, almond trees and plane trees. He cut white lines on the branches. He stripped off the outside part of the wood to show white lines.
korean_text: 야곱이 버드나무와 살구나무와 신풍나무의 푸른 가지를 가져다가 그것들의 껍질을 벗겨 흰 무늬를 내고

sentences.original_text: Jacob took branches that he had cut from trees.
He took them from poplar trees, almond trees and plane trees.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 버드나무, 아몬드나무, 그리고 플라타너스 나무에서 가져왔다.

sentences.original_text: He cut white lines on the branches.
He stripped off the outside part of the wood
